mapper.select:
SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}

SELECT t.*, (SELECT t2.f_descript FROM t_ware_entrytraylocalmap as t1 LEFT JOIN t_base_locationinfo as t2 on t1.f_local_code=t2.f_local_code WHERE t1.f_local_code=t.f_local_code LIMIT 1) as f_descript FROM t_ware_entrytraylocalmap t WHERE f_batch_no = #{batchNo}
SELECT FROM t_ware_entrytraylocalmap WHERE f_id = #{id} and f_status = 0 and f_is_delete = 0
